item.description:
Hello everyone,

I am posting this for anyone who loves wonderful music in a warm and cozy atmosphere among friends.  I know that our group has had mixed reactions to Cugino's and has asked that I try other restaurants.  However, I really love Gale B. Gardiner's gorgeous music and angelic voice, and this is the restaurant she play at in Cheshire.  I think the idea of her playing there for Valentine's Day sounds wonderful.  I find the restaurant to be cozy and welcoming.   So, I am posting this event just to anyone of you who enjoy the music and atmosphere and to anyone who might want to give it a try.  I send apologies to those who have had negative experiences, but would love to also see you come again and give it another try...just for the music and company.  

I sadly can not be there myself this time, as I am caring for a friend who is having surgery that day.  But Antoinette has kindly agreed to host the event and to arrive at 6 p.m.  Gale will be playing from 6 to 9 p.m., so you are welcome to come at any time you wish and eat as much or as little as you like.  There is a full bar as well. 

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. 

You can check out Gale on CDbaby to get a sense of the quality of her music! http://www.cdbaby.com/Artist/GaleBGardiner2

And find her on facebook...  www.facebook.com/fortunesgale

Kelly
item.name: Valentine's Day Sweet Serenade
